channel.title: Jonas Uekötter on Jonas
channel.description: Recent content in Jonas Uekötter on Jonas

item.title: My Flutter Packages
item.description: My Flutter Packages I’ve created some nice libraries for Flutter. Feedback feedback on pub.dev This is a package which tries to make it really easy to gather feedback from your users. See here for more info. Unleash unleash ob pub.dev Unleash is a feature toggle service. My package is the recommended unofficial client for Dart as seen in the official repository. Splash splash ob pub.dev

item.title: Bookmarks
item.description: Versioning Schemes CalVer SemVer Changelogs & Commits Keep-A-Changelog Conventional Changelog Conventional Comments (for reviews) Readmes Readme.so Make A Readme Dart’s guide on Readmes Design checklist.design Various Links career-ladders.dev What are different kinds of roles and what can you expect of them Dropbox Career Ladder TLDR legal Short explanations of various (software) licenses

item.title: Longboard Guide
item.description: document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () { if (navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('android') -1) { window.location.href = 'https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.lazyheroproductions.bushingcalculator' } if (navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('iphone') -1) { // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4137426/get-itunes-link-for-app-before-submitting window.location.href = 'http://itunes.apple.com/app/id1268427425' } }); Policy Policy The App "Longboard Guide" does not collect any personal data. It collects crash reports, which cannot be used to identify a person.

item.title: Open Source Dashboard
item.description: #content img { margin: auto; } Dashboard This is an overview over some of my open source software. It is primarily used by myself to get a better impression of its current status. feedback version likes popularity pub points var repo = 'feedback'; var url = 'https://api.github.com/repos/ueman/' + repo ; var pullUrl = 'https://api.

item.title: Sponsor
item.description: Sponsor me I’m working on my packages on my free time, but I don’t have as much time as I would like to have. If the software I created is helping you, please consider to sponsor me. By doing so, you are really helping me out maintaining it. I’ll also prioritize your issues or your pull-requests before the others. Thanks! I really appreciate your support. Paypal | Buy me a coffee | GitHub Sponsor
